程序包 io.ktor.features

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CompressionEncoder
    Represents a Compression encoder
    ConditionsHolderBuilder
    Represents a builder for conditions
    ContentConverter
    A custom content converted that could be registered in class ContentNegotiation feature for any particular content type Could provide bi-directional conversion implementation. One of the most typical examples of content converter is a json content converter that provides both serialziation and deserialization
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AutoHeadResponse  
    CORS  
    CallLogging
    Logs application lifecycle and call events.
    CallLoggingKt  
    Compression
    Feature to compress a response based on conditions and ability of client to decompress it
    CompressionEncoderBuilder
    Builder for compression encoder configuration
    CompressionEncoderConfig
    Configuration for an encoder
    CompressionKt  
    CompressionOptions
    Compression feature configuration
    ConditionalHeaders
    Feature to check modified/match conditional headers and avoid sending contents if it was not changed
    ConditionalHeadersKt  
    ContentNegotiation
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-5.3 https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Content_negotiation
    ContentNegotiationKt  
    DataConversion  
    DataConversionKt  
    DefaultHeaders
    Adds standard HTTP headers Date and Server and provides ability to specify other headers that are included in responses.
    DeflateEncoder
    Implementation of the deflate encoder
    DelegatingConversionService  
    ForwardedHeaderSupport
    Forwarded header support. See RFC 7239 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7239
    GzipEncoder
    Implementation of the gzip encoder
    HSTS  
    HttpsRedirect  
    IdentityEncoder
    Implementation of the identity encoder
    MultipleRangeWriterKt  
    MutableOriginConnectionPoint  
    OriginConnectionPointKt  
    PartialContentSupport  
    PartialContentSupportKt  
    StatusPages  
    StatusPagesKt  
    XForwardedHeadersSupport
